About the Overlook Lodge

Discover an exceptional retreat seamlessly integrated with the splendor of Yosemite National Park â€“ welcome to the OverLook Lodge! Our hotel invites you to an unparalleled experience, where the allure of nature converges with the comfort of premium accommodations. Situated at the threshold of Yosemite in the Sierra Nevada mountains of California, the OverLook Lodge offers a gateway to the park's extraordinary features, including towering granite cliffs, majestic waterfalls, and ancient sequoia trees. As our cherished guest, you'll enjoy a stay that seamlessly blends the charm of the lodge with the awe-inspiring beauty of one of America's most iconic national treasures.

Nestled in the heart of Yosemite Valley, the OverLook Lodge positions you mere moments away from the park's renowned attractions. Wake up to panoramic views of El Capitan and Half Dome, setting the stage for a day filled with exploration and adventure. Whether you're an avid hiker, a nature enthusiast, or someone seeking a serene escape, our lodge ensures the perfect balance of convenience and proximity to Yosemite's wonders. Picture yourself returning to the warm embrace of the OverLook Lodge after a day of discovery, where the spirit of Yosemite seamlessly extends into every aspect of your lodging experience.
